窉窉窉

窉字的基本解释

窉
bìng
农历三月。
睡觉多；老想睡觉。

窉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bǐng］
［《廣韻》兵永切，上梗，幫。］
同“寎2”。
农历三月的别称。

窉字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【穴字部】　窉； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页864第23
【廣韻】兵永切【集韻】補永切，?音丙。【爾雅·釋歲】三月爲窉。郭璞讀作丘詠切。　又【集韻】陂病切，音柄。又况病切。又鋪病切。義?同。　又【玉篇】穴也。　又【篇海】驚病也。　本作寎。

窉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
窉字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
bìng
The third month of the lunar calendar.
Sleep a lot; always want to sleep.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bǐng］
["Guang Yun" Bing Yong cuts, on the stem, help. ]
Same as "寎2".
Another name for the third month of the lunar calendar.
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Acupoint Word Department] 　窉; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 864 Page 23
[Guang Yun] Bing Yong Qi [Ji Yun] Make up Yong Qi,? Sound C. 【Erya·Susui】March is the census. Guo Pu is pronounced Qiu Yongqie.　[Jiyun] Pi is sick and cut, and the sound handle. Also sickly. Shop again sickly. Righteous? Same.　[Jade Chapter] Acupoints again.　[Pianhai] Also shocked.　This is for 寎.

Name meaning
Nothing.
bǐng
(Cant.) to hide things, to conceal
